parameters: The City of Magistia was added to the Warp Crystal!
Recently demons have been attacking this city more
often.\. The knights ar having trouble keeping them
But ever since young Elil brought \c[26]Nana\c[0] to the
city things have been better.\. A demon that fights
Nana-chan lives with young Elil now in this city.\.
I'm very thankful we have somebody like that around.
I almost feel safe with her around.
My job is to watch out for demons entering the city.\.
It's important to inform everybody of any demon
My job is to watch out for demons entering the city.\.
It seems there is no end to this job...
This barricade to the city help to prevent demons
However during the last raid it managed to get
I hope we fix it soon.
The barricades have been heavily damaged from repeated
attacks by demons.\. It can barely hold off another.\.
I want to repair it but lack the materials needed!
Inside the ice labyrinth to the west lies a special
ore called \c[6]cryolite\c[0].\. It's what makes these
I would normally get it myself but since a demon
attack could happen at any moment I'm needed here to
Then we can collect that ore for you!
May I ask you of this favour...?
The \c[6]cryolite\c[0] is at the back of the labyrinth.\.
Be careful, the demons there are very tough indeed.
The \c[6]cryolite\c[0] is at the back of the labyrinth.\.
Be careful, the demons there are very tough indeed.
I shall start the repairs at once!
First you must melt the cryolite with fire magic...
Next you must pour it into here...
Then one must harden it with ice magic!
With your help you have made the city of Magistia
Fwaa...\. That quest has made me really
hungry all of a sudden.\. Yuzu-chan we
should go get something to eat...
It came from outside the city!
The city's defenses are fine now.\.
But you must go help Nana!
Is this barracade still needed now?\.
Hey!\. You're an adventurer from the guild in Emeralia!\.
Can I ask you for a favor?
Weeell ~\. I was thinking of making a brand new coat
to go with my shoes.\. But the fur need to make such
a lovely coat comes from those pesky demons.
I'll need 5 'Husky Fur' to make such a coat!\.
Could you please get them for me loveley adventurer?
I knew I could count on such lovely adventurers!
With this fur I can make the most comfortable, warm
and beautiful coat in the city!
For helping me out why not have this?\.
It's not like I need it or anything.
It just hit me...\. If everyone has a Cairo
Stone why do you need such a large coat?
For the fashion!\. A girl has to look her best.\.
I want a nice coat too now!
You can find 'Husky Fur' from those pesky Asura Yeti
demons.\. I would like 5 pieces pleeeease ~ !
Hey!\. Hey!\. Let's make one too ~ !
Um...\. I think my one is missing a little
I-\.I still have to grow!\. What's with
There's something shiney at the bottom
You want to see what it is?
I can fit!\. I'm gonna take a look!
I don't wanna stay stuck in a well!
Damn!\. I can't get you out...!\.
(Has she put on weight or something?!)
Hey, can somebody help us here?\.
What are doing Yuzu!?\. Don't call people!!\.
I don't want them seeing me like this!!
Serves you right for being greedy.
Nana was taken away?\. What is the meaning of this?!
We're going to get her back.\.
That Almegia doesn't know who she's dealing
with.\. We'll save her, don't worry.
Almegia is strong, and quite ruthless if the demon
raids are anything to go by.
Thanks to you though our barricades are repaired.\.
If Almegia thinks she can storm this city now she'll
Nana may be a demon but she has fought alongside us.\.
That makes her no different from a fellow knight.
I was asked to defend the city by the guild.\.
On my way here I saw a strange demon...
It looked like a Harpy but...\. It had an Afro.\.
I was so captivated!\. But I lost sight of it...
If you see that Harpy please tell me!\.
You should be able to record a sighting using your
It still sounds ridiculous to me.
Hahaha...\. W-\.We'll be sure to report to
That's it!\. That's the Afro Harpy!\.
I KNEW IT!\. I wasn't seeing things!
Why does it have an afro anyway?\.
Anyway, thanks for finding one for me!
You got \c[4]Sleep Guard Lv 2\c[0] as a reward!
If you see a Afro Harpy please tell me!
For some strange reason that Afro Harpy has been on
my mind...\. I should look for it myself!
Sometimes I cannot sleep due to the fear...
You beat that Demon Emperor didn't you?\.
Why aren't there more demon's like Nana?\.
When I grow up I wanna be an adventurer too!
